column6: The start of a new arc!  Squirrel Girl meets some potential new allies, including... GIRL SQUIRREL??   I don't know why we put question marks there; it's actually what happens! Also a hippo named "Hippo" is in this issue!  This character already existed and we absolutely did NOT make him up at the last minute! ALSO THERE'S FIGHTS!!  AND EVEN SOME FEELINGS!
